title: Loot Is bugged?
body: So i got grey Warwick and mid evil Twitch from my loot capsule, but when i looked in my collection twitch was unlocked with skin but Warwick wasn't. Any help guys?

replies.body: my loot page  is bugged to. the chests i recieved in preseason don t land on my lootpage.  for exemple today i recieved a chest for having honor lvl 5. But when i go to my loot page... no chest.. i am having this problem since preseason started. pls help.

I went ahead and double checked this for you and the Honor Capsule that you opened only gave you Medival Twitch and not both skins. If you remember opening a second capsule that gave you Grey Warwick, or maybe possibly you got him on a different account, let me know with a screenshot so I can start digging a little deeper for you to figure out what happened.

I am sure it did not give me a skin on a 2nd account, and I swear I saw 2 things pop up, one being grey Warwick, being added to my collection, I could be totally and delusional but I trust you know what you are talking about. Sorry for the inconvenience.
The capsule that gave you the Twitch skin definitely didn't give you both, they aren't designed like that. Those honor capsules might give you one or the other, but not both at once.
